meaning: severance, decline, refuse, apologize, warn, dismiss, prohibit, decision, judgement, cutting

onyomiExamples.meaning: one's own judgement (judgment), decision made without consulting others, arbitrary decision, dogmatism
running through (north-south), cutting across, travelling across, cutting vertically, sectioning longitudinally

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to sever, to cut off, to suppress, to eradicate, to exterminate, to abstain (from), to give up
to refuse, to reject, to dismiss, to turn down, to decline, to inform, to give notice, to tell in advance, to ask leave, to excuse oneself (from)
